remarks: Lemma for ~ ibladdnc ; cf ~ ibladdlem , whose fifth hypothesis is rendered unnecessary by the weakened hypotheses of ~ itg2addnc . (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 31-Oct-2017.)
statement:
ibladdnclem.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
ibladdnclem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
ibladdnclem.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D = ( B + C ) ) $.
ibladdnclem.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
ibladdnclem.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ B ) , B , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
ibladdnclem.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ C ) , C , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
ibladdnclem $p |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ D ) , D , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
